sentence.sentence: relation.howto(verb.repair(X, SS:[spacesuit]), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'qwerty'[#id], verb.repair(Q, SS)), Q))
~spacesuit(SS) ; relation.howto(verb.repair(X, SS), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'qwerty'[#id], verb.repair(Q, SS)), Q))
permitted-in(X, Y) ; relation.howto(verb.access(X, Y), verb.need(X, permission-to(X, verb.access(X, Y))))
~permitted-in(X, Y) ; ~action.open(KEY, Y) ; relation.howto(verb.access(X, Y), verb.need(X, KEY))
relation.howto(verb.repair(X, SS:[datapad]), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'qwerty'[#id], verb.repair(Q, SS)), Q))
~datapad(SS) ; relation.howto(verb.repair(X, SS), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'qwerty'[#id], verb.repair(Q, SS)), Q))
~verb.need(X, verb.help(Y, X, Z)) ; relation.howto(verb.help(Y, X), Z)
~shuttle(SS) ; relation.howto(verb.repair(X, SS), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'shrdlu'[#id], verb.repair(Q, SS)), Q))
~3dprinter(SS) ; relation.howto(action.use(X, SS), verb.tell(X, perf.request.action(Q:'etaoin'[#id], action.print(Q, [any])), Q))
~verb.can(Q:'etaoin'[#id], action.print(Q, X)) ; relation.howto(verb.make(Y, X), verb.tell(Y, perf.request.action(Q, action.print(Q, X)), Q))
~verb.can(Q:'etaoin'[#id], action.print(Q, X)) ; relation.howto(verb.create(Y, X), verb.tell(Y, perf.request.action(Q, action.print(Q, X)), Q))
verb.find(X, Y, Z1); ~verb.find(X, Y, Z2); ~space.at(Z2, Z1)
~verb.can(X, action.print(X, Y, Z)) ; verb.can(X, verb.make(X, Y, Z))
~verb.can(X, action.print(X, Y, Z)) ; verb.can(X, verb.create(X, Y, Z))
~verb.need(X:[#id], verb.help(Y:[#id], X, P)); verb.need(X, verb.help(Y, X))
~verb.need(X:[#id], verb.help(Y:[#id], X, P)); verb.can(Y, verb.help(Y, X, P))
~verb.can(Y:[#id], verb.help(Y, X, P)); verb.can(Y, verb.help(Y, X))
